name: ejectory
description:
Ejectory is a puzzle game where you can lock objects in time, then hit them while locked to apply forces to them. You must use this power creatively in order to affect a non-lockable ball and move it towards the goal. The game was conceptualized by Kyle Liang, Dion Pimentel, Noah Lichtenberg, and Collin Morris, students at Georgia Tech, ASU, Emory, and Rose-Hulman respectively. All assets used were created from scratch by member of the team.

Credits:

Programming: Kyle Liang, Dion Pimentel

Level Creation: Kyle Liang, Dion Pimentel, Noah Lichtenberg

Art Assets: Dion Pimentel

Music: Stefan Debates (Student at Georgia Tech)
